Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Wise stood motionlessly by his desk. He was looking at the old mechanical watch on his wrist. It looked decades old with a clock face full of scratches.'}
{3: 'He stared at the hand that ticked silently until a mail popped up in his terminal.'}

{3: 'The email contained the results of the candidates applying to enter the Engineering Force. As a senior member of Cosmos Technicians Union, a few strings were all he had to pull to get his hands on something like this.'}
{3: 'He skimmed through the list and, after seeing the name he was looking for, he deleted the email.'}
{3: 'He then took out a physical letter from a secret drawer in his desk.'}
{3: 'It was a handwritten letter—which was a rarity, given that people rarely wrote letters by hand in the Golden Age.'}
{3: 'For people like Wise, physical letters had the benefit of leaving no traces of communication on the Internet, making them the safest means of communication.'}
{3: 'He opened the letter—and saw that it had nothing except a line of digits written on it.'}
{3: 'It was a coordinate, a silent invitation.'}
{3: 'A one-way ticket with no return.'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: '...So this is it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He stood up and walked out of the lab, all the while casting not a second glance back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wise! Hey, Wise! I passed!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll be going on a mission with the Engineering Force three days later! We'll be on the ground for quite a few days, so can I hand in my report late—", 4: '1'}
{3: "Her excitement dissipated in an instant, having not seen the figure she couldn't be more familiar with in the empty lab."}
{3: 'Karenina knew Wise well. He planned his schedule down to the atomic second and would never be missing from where he should be at any time.'}
{3: 'But the room was devoid of any traces of him, as if he had never even existed.'}
{3: 'Only one short note was left on the spotless table. Karenina picked it up and read the very few words Wise had left her.', 6: '1'}
{1: 'If you are reading this note, that would mean you have passed the Engineering Force entrance assessment.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Which also means that I no longer have anything to teach you.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "You are talented. Now that you have a good foundation, you'll go far just by self-learning.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I have finished my duties, so we have no more reason to stay in contact.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I hope you will live up to Professor Kalon's name with your achievements as his successor.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "And that's that.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's... that?", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '5'}
{3: 'The man—who had been a teacher to Karenina for all these years, who had taught her how to survive in this cruel world as a Construct...'}
{3: 'Just cut off their ties like that, without even a proper farewell.'}
{3: "From that moment on, Wise completely vanished from Karenina's life."}
